lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the problem of bad loans led to a rescue by three state banks of medium-sized Turkiye Ogretmenler Bankasi AS earlier this year when the Treasury, which acts as a watchdog body over banks, discovered that the its assets were to a large extent made up of non-performing loans.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "When we saw that there was a demand and supply of money outside the banking system, we could not envisage ourselves excluded from these transactions," said Osman Erk, deputy general manager of the private bank Yapi ve Kredi Bankasi AS.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although local banks tried to follow suit, Turkey's exports declined last year to 7.4 billion dlrs from 7.9 billion in 1985 and bankers doubt there is enough business to go round.
